about_the_game:
Race to save the future in RE/TERRA as you chart a path through the remains of real world locations around the globe to try and find the key to the future hidden in forgotten vaults

EXPLORE regions of the world as you find a route through what remains, each area of the planet having its own unique challenges

UNLOCK the vaults hidden in these cities are you search for program fragments and powerful technologies to help your mission

SCAVENGE as many resources as you can, as you send teams to search these cities. Unique and faster teams will enable you to find more resources, but will have drawbacks of their own.

REAL WORLD locations are used to generate each continent, providing a different set of tasks and challenges on every playthrough
